title: SCRIPT NOT PERFORMING LONGER
content: On Ebay I continually get a message from Adblock Plus that interferes with my browsing. I asked a question about this and Mozilla came up and told me I have a problem with the script not running longer. I have no idea what this is. It has never done this before. I need to be able to browse Ebay without this interference.
creator: gregaryus
